title: How can democratic regimes become authoritarian

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, C, and D. A) Define authoritarianism. B) Describe a difference between an authoritarian regime and a democratic regime. C) Explain how a democratic regime may become authoritarian. D) Explain why authoritarian regimes sometimes hold direct elections for government officials.
